report.main: Very interesting paper on a novel domain with a clear presentation and interesting findings.  The paper should state more clearly at the outset that the research was performed on English data. I would even argue for "100,000 Podcasts: A Large-Scale Spoken English Document Corpus" See https://thegradient.pub/the-benderrule-on-naming-the-languages-we-study-and-why-it-matters/ Table 3 is opaque to me and would profit from column headers or a more elaborate caption.
